attributes.action: GIVE NIGEL FARAGE A KNIGHTHOOD FOR HIS SERVICE TO THE UNITED KINGDOM
attributes.background: Nigel Farage has worked tirelessly to save our Country from the EU, he must be rewarded for his service to Queen & Country

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
